title.rendered: Sold Out – J Beauty Pro Brushes

content.rendered:
Face Essential (11 Brushes)

FOUNDATION BRUSH – Applies foundation smoothly, with non-absorbent, vegan and hypoallergenic bristles.

POWDER BRUSH – Achieves a flawless finish with powder.

CREAM BLENDER – Blends liquid or cream foundation perfectly.

TAPERED POWDER BRUSH – Blends effortlessly with dome-shaped bristles.

POINTED CONTOUR – Creates a dramatic contour with dense bristle arrangement and defined tip.

HIGHLIGHT – Adds a glowing, radiant look with sweeping motions across cheekbones.

FAN HIGHLIGHT – Sweeps highlighter across cheekbones to create a beautiful glow.

DUO FIBER BRUSH – Dabs and blends cream blush, concealer, and highlighter flawlessly.

SLANTED FOUNDATION – Dabs and blends cream or liquid products for a smooth finish.

CONCEALER BRUSH – Seamlessly blends liquid or cream concealer with a dabbing motion.

BRONZER BRUSH – Creates a natural-looking sun-kissed glow with precise shading.

EYE ESSENTIAL (14 Brushes)

BROW BRUSH – Creates precise, well-defined eyebrows with angled tip, and is also great for eyeliner application.

ANGLE SHADOW – Applies and blends eye shadow perfectly.

SHADOW DIFFUSER – Perfect for smoky crease or highlighting cheekbones, and works great for loose powder.

DEFINER EYE BRUSH – Brightens inner and brow bone areas perfectly.

LARGE EYE BLENDER – Blends large areas or applies highlights on cheekbones perfectly.

TAPERED EYE BLENDER – Shades or blends pressed shadows with ease.

CREAM SHADOW – Applies cream shadows, concealers or pressed eye shadows perfectly.

POINTED EYE BRUSH – Smokes out pencil liners for a perfect look.

SPOOLIE – Separates lashes or brushes out brows for a smooth finish.

UNDER EYE BLENDER – Blends defined areas perfectly, great for under-eye transitions.

MEDIUM EYE BLENDER – Provides eye blending precision.

FLAT EYE BRUSH – Packs on color to the entire eye area.

PENCIL EYE BLENDER – Softens edges or smokes out for a perfect look.

FLAT DEFINER – Great definer brush for the lower lash area.

LIP (1 Brush)

LIP BRUSH – Applies lip color smoothly for a perfect finish.

excerpt.rendered: Get ready to elevate your makeup game with the J Beauty Pro Makeup Brush Set with one beauty sponge . Our set has everything you need to achieve a flawless, filtered look with ease. Made with high-quality synthetic or natural bristles, our brushes ensure a smooth and even application of your favorite products. Our vegan brushes are the most hypoallergenic option available, making them perfect for those with sensitive skin. Achieve a perfect, professional look every time with our makeup brush set!
